text: Is this what you are trying to do?
I used, "onFormSubmitted" and a function that removes the submitted form and its container, then creates the form and appends it to the parent wrapper.

It's a little buggy when it comes to filling it out a second time - I think there's some other stuff going on in the javascript? it'd be nice if there was a hbspt.forms.destroy() method that cleans things up
